scripts.init: wget https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/22.04/packages-microsoft-prod.deb -O packages-microsoft-prod.deb && sudo dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb  && rm packages-microsoft-prod.deb && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y dotnet-sdk-6.0 && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y aspnetcore-runtime-6.0
